verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thee with my whole <S%H3605><s%> heart: <S%H3820><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> will I sing praise <S%H2167><s%> unto thee.

I will worship <S%H7812><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> thy holy <S%H6944><s%> temple, <S%H1964><s%> and praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and for <S%H5921><s%> thy truth: <S%H571><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou hast magnified <S%H1431><s%> thy word <S%H565><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I cried <S%H7121><s%> thou answeredst <S%H6030><s%> me, and strengthenedst <S%H7292><s%> me with strength <S%H5797><s%> in my soul. <S%H5315><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> thee, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> they hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of thy mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Yea, they shall sing <S%H7891><s%> in the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> is the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Though <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be high, <S%H7311><s%> yet hath he respect <S%H7200><s%> unto the lowly: <S%H8217><s%> but the proud <S%H1364><s%> he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> afar off. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4801><s%>

Though <S%H518><s%> I walk <S%H1980><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> thou wilt revive <S%H2421><s%> me: thou shalt stretch forth <S%H7971><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the wrath <S%H639><s%> of mine enemies, <S%H341><s%> and thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall save <S%H3467><s%> me.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> will perfect <S%H1584><s%> that which concerneth <S%H1157><s%> me: thy mercy, <S%H2617><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> endureth forever: <S%H5769><s%> forsake <S%H7503><s%> not <S%H408><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of thine own hands. <S%H3027><s%>
